slides.title: Every Child Deserves a Future Full of Hope
slides.subtitle: Help us break the cycle of poverty. Your donation today can transform a child's life forever - from dropping out to becoming a doctor, engineer, or teacher.

slides.title: When Illness Strikes, Hope Shouldn't Be Lost
slides.subtitle: Imagine a mother watching her child suffer because she can't afford medicine. Your support brings our medical teams to remote villages, saving lives every day.

slides.title: From Helpless to Hopeful: Women Reclaiming Their Dreams
slides.subtitle: Meet Lakshmi, who went from earning ₹50/day to ₹500/day after our training. Your donation doesn't just change one life - it transforms entire families and communities.
